price: ya que Dios es el Sustentador, el Fuerte, el Firme.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلرَّزَّاقُ ذُو ٱلۡقُوَّةِ ٱلۡمَتِينُ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha huwa al-razāqu dhū al-quwati al-matīnu
